responses: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hi there, what can I do for you?

patterns: What is the Women Coding Community?
responses: The Women Coding Community is a space to empower women in technology.
We offer mentorship, events, and learning resources for women in tech.
I can answer questions about the Women Coding Community, its events, and other details.
We offer online courses, tutorials, and coding challenges to help you improve your skills. PLease join our Slack channel for more information.
We have regular meetups, workshops, and seminars. Check our meetup page https://www.meetup.com/women-coding-community/events/ for the latest events.

patterns: How can I get a mentor?
responses: We offer mentorship programs to help you grow in your career. The list of mentors is available on our website at https://womencodingcommunity.com/mentors.

patterns: I need mentors with AWS experience
I need a mentor in System Design
responses: The list of mentors is available on our website at https://womencodingcommunity.com/mentors.
